s.name: Dream Sequins®
s.description: This is that record that got me into vaporwave, and it is the very best.

s.name: ロ​ス​ト​エ​デ​ン​へ​の​パ​ス (The path to lost eden)
s.artist: Nmesh and t e l e p a t h テレパシー能力者
s.description: Not a single track is a miss. Both artists put their best works ever on here.

s.name: I'll Try Living Like This
s.description: Haunting, soothing, terrifying and sad at the same time. Nothing will ever be similar to this masterpiece.

s.name: 大​理​石​の​フ​ァ​ン​タ​ジ​ー (Marble Fantasy)
s.description: Idk man this record slaps so fucking hard.

s.name: Rain Temple
s.description: This is just amazing. No further comment nessecary.

s.name: The city is my friend
s.description: Masterpiece. Definitely better than Birth of a new Day.

s.name: L.Y.F
s.description: Super nice. Some tracks are just fantastic. Personal favorite is 'Changing Trains'.

s.name: REMNANTS
s.description: My god this record is nice. Bimodal is my favorite Oblique Occasions track.

a.name: Nu.wav Hallucinations
a.description: Great, but Dream Sequins® is better. I own this on vinyl.

a.name: NEWS AT 11
a.description: The best from catsystemcorp. This is a very special concept album.

a.name: 痛​み​の​永​遠 (Eternity of Pain)
a.description: The best that macroblank ever put out. So happy I have the vinyl.

a.name: ルートバックホーム (Route Back Home)
a.description: Just great. I love how it slowly builds up the music throughout the entire record.

a.name: 新​し​い​日​の​誕​生 (Birth of a new Day)
a.description: Slightly overrated, still amazing. So happy to own on vinyl!

a.name: Ibis valley
a.description: Excellent. Barber Beats/Late Night Lofi is a very good combination.

a.name: Pharma
a.description: Words cannot describe what this record is. Just know it's good.

a.name: Sable Covenant
a.description: Just some very nice and chill barber beats. Nothing new is best track.

a.name: 孤​独​な​人​々​の​た​め​の​内​省​的​な​音​楽
a.description: (Introspective Music For Lonely People). Overdose in paradise is amazing. The rest is also quality.

b.name: Cytherea Somniare
b.description: By far my favorite DARKPYRAMID record. It just has a very special mood.

b.name: Darklife
b.description: So experimental it's impossible to tell what it is. Still not the best dds record though.

b.name: Good Morning America
b.description: Almost as good as NEWS AT 11. Still very special.

b.name: SH40
b.description: That first track is perfect. The rest of the record is good, but New Surroundings is the peak.

b.name: A Deep Dive Into The Conflicted and Scared Psyche
b.description: Idk, this record isn't that good, but I keep coming back to it. It is definitely very special.

b.name: Mana Pool
b.description: Classic vaportrap record. I like this more than Blank Banshee 0/1.

b.name: Perfect world
b.description: Pretty good. It isn't as immersive as other dreampunk records, but still, good. I also own the tape.

b.name: Slide
b.description: Better than 100% Electronica. Not really that much to say beyond that.

c.name: VHS LOUNGE
c.description: The perfect late night lofi record for a night walk, I am sure of it.

c.name: 100% Electronica
c.description: It's ok. Some tracks are excellent though. (Bleed, It makes the babies want to cry)

c.name: terminally online
c.description: Some heavy bangers on side A, some misses on side B.

c.name: 超​越​愛 (beyond love)
c.description: I dig it. It's a little samy, but still good.

c.name: Time Moved Like It Used To
c.description: A little too dubsteppy for me. The tape is gorgeous btw.

d.name: virtua.zip
d.description: Just very short. And some cuts I simply don't like.
It's meh. Nothing special like other 2814 records.

d.name: 行​方​不​明 (Unknown)
d.description: Severly overrated. Good, just some tracks are really forgettable.

e.name: Floral Shoppe
e.description: Just kinda bad. It started the genre sure but it's not that great.
